Experience

  • System Kudi

    2022-2023

    I am a skilled Web Developer with experience working at System Kudi in Santa Clara, Cuba. In my role, I specialize in Frontend Development using ReactJS. I am proficient in utilizing various libraries such as Material UI, PrimeReact, and PrimeFlex for designing user interfaces. Additionally, I have expertise in Git Hub and Git management, ensuring efficient version control and collaboration within development teams. I am passionate about creating intuitive and visually appealing web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

  • IT Department

    2021-2023

    I am a dynamic Full Stack Developer currently working in the IT Department of Santa Clara, Cuba. While in the process of obtaining my B.S. degree, I have gained experience in various roles, including Networking Engineer and DevOps. I have expertise in technologies such as OpenStack, Docker, and Ceph, enabling me to develop scalable and efficient systems. Additionally, I am proficient in Linux and have experience as a Backend Developer using Nestjs and PostgreSQL. On the frontend, I excel as a developer using React, creating engaging and user-friendly interfaces. With my versatile skill set and dedication to continuous learning, I am committed to delivering high-quality solutions that meet the needs of both clients and end-users.

  • Servicontainer

    2023-2024

    I have a strong background in Frontend Development with a focus on ReactJS. I have worked extensively with React to create compelling user interfaces and interactive web applications. In addition, I have hands-on experience utilizing Material UI, a popular UI component library, to design visually appealing and responsive interfaces. As part of my development workflow, I have also utilized Axios, a powerful HTTP client, to seamlessly communicate with backend APIs. With my expertise in ReactJS, Material UI, and Axios, I am able to deliver elegant and efficient frontend solutions that enhance the user experience.
